DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis of this study is that POCT will shorten ED turn-around-time (TAT) such as blood drawing TAT, lab TAT, and decision TAT.
DOC.brief_title: Point-Of-Care Chemistry Test (POCT) Effect on the Emergency Department (ED)
DOC.criteria: Patients older than 15 years clinically required to have chemistry lab tests agreement no agreement ESI level 1
